text: Gian Luigi Rondi (10 December 1921 â€“ 22 September 2016) was an Italian film critic. He was a member of the jury at the 12th and 15th Moscow International Film Festival. He was also a member of the jury at the 11th and 32nd Berlin International Film Festival. Category:1921 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Movie critics Category:Italian people
title: Gian Luigi Rondi
